tswitem.name: Signet of Desperation
tswitem.tooltip:
Signet of Desperation
Signet (QL 10)
Tradeable
Effect: Whenever you directly heal an ally whose health is below 50%, you heal them for an additional 200-800/400-1600/600-2400. The amount healed is increased the closer your ally is to death. This effect cannot occur more than once every 20 seconds. This Signet can be attached to Minor Talismans.
